sect1.title: Anonymous Access
sect1.para: To get anonymous access, simply use the following commands (note that these assume you are using bash or a similar shell:

screen.userinput: export CVSROOT=:pserver:anonymous@cvs.linuxfromscratch.org:/home/cvsroot && cvs login && cvs checkout BLFS

sect1.para: When prompted for a password, just hit enter.
This will create the LFS directory and copy the current working tree into it. When you wish to update your local copy (often called a sandbox), simply cd into the directory and run: cvs update
